name: "The Bachelor"--The one with Jesse Palmer Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following was not a name of a girl from this season of "The Bachelor"?
questions.explanation:
Lisa.

	Suzie, Katie, and Karen all made it past the first round.  However, there was not a Lisa this season.

questions.text: Where did Jesse go on his overnight date with Tara?
questions.explanation:
Quebec City.

	Jesse and Tara went ice skating and on a carriage ride around the city.

questions.text: Which were the two girls names that Jesse got mixed up during the first rose ceremony?
questions.explanation:
Katie and Karen.

	One of the most embarassing bachelor moments was when Jesse called out Katie's name while looking at Karen.  He felt bad, admitted his mistake and asked that Katie stay.  She was ultimately eliminated in the third rose ceremony.  Karen was eliminated in the fourth rose ceremony.

questions.text: Trish was known as the vixen of the house.  Which of the following things did she do that made all of the girls believe that she was not right for Jesse?
options: Admitted that she thought children were dirty
Admitted to having an affair with a married man
Admitted that she was really into someone with money
questions.explanation:
All of these.

	Trish did not make friends with anyone in the house.  When the other girls were out keg tipping she was sitting alone in the kitchen.  She openly wore a shirt that said she was a gold digger.  She admitted to having slept with both men and women who were married.  However, she did not give up after Jesse did not give her a rose after the fifth ceremony.  She showed up on his date with Mandy Jaye and pleaded that he spend the night with her.  Finally he was able to see her true colors.

questions.text: Which of the following ladies had participated in beauty pageants?
questions.explanation:
Mandy Jaye and Karen.

	Mandy Jaye participated in several pageants in Texas and Tennessee.  Karen was a former Miss Rhode Island.  One of Jesse's biggest problems with Mandy Jaye was he felt that she was programmed in her responses because of all of the pageants she had been in.

questions.text: Which of the ladies were in the final four?
questions.correct: Trish, Jessica, Tara, and Mandy Jaye
options: Trish, Suzie, Karen, and Mandy Jaye
Jessica, Tara, Karen, and Mandy Jaye
Tara, Jessica, Mandy Jaye, and Suzie
questions.explanation:
Trish, Jessica, Tara, and Mandy Jaye.

	These four ladies all got to take Jesse home to meet their families.

questions.text: Who did Jesse first tell that he was falling in love with?
questions.explanation:
Jessica.

	He told Jessica that he was falling in love with her on their overnight date, but he also told her that he was falling in love with someone else as well.

questions.text: What did Jesse make for dinner on his last date with Tara?
questions.correct: grilled chicken breasts and baked potatoes
options: cornish game hens and garlic mashed potatoes
grilled salmon and garlic mashed potatoes
grilled chicken wings and seasoned vegetables
questions.explanation:
grilled chicken breasts and baked potatoes.

	Jesse said that he made all of the arrangements for the dinner after he went and looked at the rings with the girls.

questions.text: Did Jesse end up purchasing an engagement ring?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	He did end up buying a ring.  It happened to be the ring that both Jessica and Tara liked.

questions.text: Did Jesse ask Jessica to marry him?
questions.explanation:
No.

	He did not ask her to marry him.  He said that he loved her and wanted to step into the real world with her and see where it led them.
